idea:
We are visionary entrepreneurs with the goal to reinvent application security in Cloud first era.

With our expertise in cyber security, we have created a next-gen platform to empower organizations to go online with their websites and applications without worrying about the emerging cyber threats.


We are a group of creative & talented cyber security experts having an intense focus to solve critical business risks which every organization face today. Our services and products keep your website secure and allows you to focus on your business.


Our Mission: To be the Tenacious Secure Gateway to the Internet for Web Applications and Apps in the ever-evolving threat landscape.



Our Vision: Empower the organizations to seamlessly adopt the Power of Internet by providing Best-in-Class Security for web applications and apps.
name: PAGENTRA INFOSEC PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
SUSTAIN AI is a start-up committed to creating IPs in the sustainability domain and also partnering with businesses to help them build sustainable solutions leveraging technologies like Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

We believe that to build sustainable business solutions, and even creating an impact in the sustainability domain, businesses don’t just need to reduce, reuse or recycle. We go down to the fundamental core of working with businesses to help them rethink.
name: SUSTAINAI PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
About the Company Happy Hikkups

“Unplug to Un-mute - Taking time to fix what is Broken!” It is not what happens during the process, but what happens afterward!

At Happy Hikkups, we are committed to bring in different art forms together, to help you escape from the chaotic world. Our Art Therapy is all about supporting people to fight stress, anxiety, emotional reflexes, and even depression. With our audio instruction/voice guide, we help people to release their stress through symbols and metaphors, such as breathing through scribble, self-portrait, colour therapy, etc.
name: HAPPY HIKKUPS (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Our ContentTech startup, Neural Garage, is designed as a SaaS product and will be eventually used by every single content creator in the world (whether creating long form or short form) through both enterprise and web based solutions.
